wordpressPage.title: Cheese Puff Face Duel
wordpressPage.content:
For this game you need some cheap shaving foam and some cheese puffs or cheetos

Invite up 4 volunteers and pair them up.

Explain that one in each pair will need to cover their face in shaving foam (get them to do this)

Then when you say go they have 1 minute to throw cheetos onto their opponents shaving foam covered face and it’s the team with the most stuck that wins!
